name: Ultra Skype Button
author: Khurshid Alam Mojumder

sections.description: It’s a awesome Skype button Plugin. You can make your own Skype call or chat button for your website. by this plugin you can customize button as you like. You can place button everywhere in your website by using Shortpre.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortpre in page or in widgets.

  4. If you want Skype Button in your theme Place [ultra_skype btn_type=”call” btn_id=”1″ color=”white” user=”theme.ultra” btn_size=”32″] in your templates.

  5. Shortpre

 [ultra_skype btn_type="call" btn_id="3" color="white" user="theme.ultra" btn_size="32"]
  1. PHP pre

short_description: It's a awesome Skype button Plugin. You can make your own Skype call or chat button for your website. by this plugin you can customize button as  …
description: It’s a awesome Skype button Plugin. You can make your own Skype call or chat button for your website. by this plugin you can customize button as you like. You can place button everywhere in your website by using Shortpre.

screenshots.caption:
Change Button Color [ultra_skype" btn_type="white" btn_id="3" user="theme.ultra"].
Note: You can use two color button only (Default is Skype color and white is another color)

Change Button size:
[ultra_skype" btn_size="10" btn_id="1" user="theme.ultra"]
[ultra_skype" btn_size="12" btn_id="2" user="theme.ultra"]
[ultra_skype" btn_size="14" btn_id="3" user="theme.ultra"]
[ultra_skype" btn_size="16" btn_id="4" user="theme.ultra"]
[ultra_skype" btn_size="24" btn_id="5" user="theme.ultra"]
[ultra_skype" btn_size="32" btn_id="6" user="theme.ultra"]
Note: You can use six(6) size button only (Default size is 24 and 10, 14, 16, 32 are another size)
